::Shredder/Zardus::

Shredder laughs, not lowering his gun. "We need reliable troops. If you want 
to be of any use, shut up."

He looks down at Quckstrike.

"We need those CR chambers, Megatron," He says to Megatron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus smiles. "Excelent. I'll show you to your quarters. Follow me."

Zardus walks off down a corridor.
